name: ralimdvva
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(w0, wi(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w1)), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w2))))
-| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wi(w1, w2))

stmt.origin: ralimdva(s0, c0, w0, wral(s1, c1, w1), wral(s1, c1, w2))
stmt.pretty: ralimdva(s0, c0, w0, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, w1), ∀(s1 ∈ c1, w2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w1)), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w2))))
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wi(wral(s1, c1, w1), wral(s1, c1, w2)))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w1)), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w2))))
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wi(wral(s1, c1, w1), wral(s1, c1, w2)))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

stmt.origin: ralimdva(s1, c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w1, w2)
stmt.pretty: ralimdva(s1, c1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), w1, w2)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wi(wral(s1, c1, w1), wral(s1, c1, w2)))
-| wi(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wi(w1, w2))
-| diffsw(s1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w1)), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w2))))

-| wi(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wi(w1, w2))

stmt.origin: anassrs(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wi(w1, w2))
stmt.pretty: anassrs(w0, s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1, (w1 → w2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wi(w1, w2))
-| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wi(w1, w2))

-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| diffsw(s1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
-| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wi(w1, w2))

body.origin:

comment: Deduction doubly quantifying both antecedent and consequent, based on Theorem 19.20 of [Margaris] p. 90 ( ~ alim ). (Contributed by AV, 27-Nov-2019.)
